knimeNode.name: Service Table Output
knimeNode.shortDescription: Reads the content of a table and makes it available to an external caller (e.g a Call Workflow node).

fullDescription.intro:
This node sends a KNIME table to an external caller (i.e. the Call Workflow (Table Based) node). A configured parameter makes the Service Table Output visible from the external caller and enables the external caller to fetch a KNIME table from the Service Table Output node.
If a data table is connected to the input port, the node will simply forward this table to the output port.
fullDescription.option: A name for the output parameter(preferably unique). This name is exposed in the REST interface and in the Call Workflow (Table Based) node.
A description for the output parameter. The description is shown in the API specification of the REST interface.

ports.inPort: Table which defines the output of the workflow.
ports.outPort: The input table directly forwarded without changes.
